title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 71 - Agent's License
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 71 - Agent's License

State Regulations
§ 71.1 - Licensing of agents
§ 71.2 - Agent's credit bond requirement
§ 71.3 - Deposit of other security
§ 71.4 - Time for filing a credit bond, depositing acceptable security and increasing the amount thereof
§ 71.5 - Refusal to license
§ 71.6 - Cancellation or suspension of a license as a cigarette agent
§ 71.7 - Notification of cancellation, suspension or refusal to license
§ 71.8 - License renewal

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. I, subch. I, art. 1, pt. 71

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 475; art. 20

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
